trans-unit.source: Contains information on a tracked <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含已追蹤之 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> 的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: The activity ID.
trans-unit.target: 活動識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的執行個體 ID。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo" /> class using the specified name, ID, instance ID and type name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、ID、執行個體 ID 與型別名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得活動的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The activity ID.
trans-unit.target: 活動識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the run-time ID of the activity instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得活動執行個體的執行階段 ID。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的執行個體 ID。

trans-unit.source: An activity can occur multiple times during processing, such as an activity that is processed within a loop.
trans-unit.target: 處理時，活動會多次發生，例如在迴圈中處理的活動。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> contains the ID of the activity and does not change while the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.InstanceId%2A> contains the ID of the specific instance of the activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> 包含活動的 ID，且不會變更，而 <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.InstanceId%2A> 則包含特定活動執行個體的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.InstanceId%2A> is different for each specific instance.
trans-unit.target: 每個特定執行個體的 <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.InstanceId%2A> 不盡相同。

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that is processed in a loop would have a different <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.InstanceId%2A> for each cycle through the loop while the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> would remain the same.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在迴圈中處理的活動，在迴圈中的每次循環中都會有不同的 <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.InstanceId%2A>，而 <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> 則維持不變。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name associated with the activity
trans-unit.target: 取得與活動關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The activity name.
trans-unit.target: 活動名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo" /> object
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo" /> 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The activity name, ID, instance ID and type name.
trans-unit.target: 活動名稱 ID、執行個體 ID 與型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定活動的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的型別名稱。
